overview:
Jodi has over 20 years of experience in high tech and is most noted for her experience in growing company revenues and establishing high-performance, results-driven organizations.

She has a proven track record in developing, implementing and managing successful operations in both startup and turnaround environments.

Her experience includes a variety of executive positions spanning marketing, sales, customer service, and business development functions. Her background also includes accomplishments in customer relationship management, finance, and accounting.

At NetSuite Inc., Jodi was the first Vice President of Sales and Business Development and took the company from zero to $30 million in revenue. She also developed and executed the International & Channel Strategies.

Other companies Jodi has worked for include PhoneWorks, Certain Software, Overtone, Frontline Systems, Sage, Ingres, Culpepper & Associates, and AT&T.

Jodi holds a BS Degree in Business Administration with a major in accounting from the University of Georgia.
